name: Fathom Away
overview:
Fathom is the travel website reinvented — through inspiring stories, practical advice, and useful tools and products. Fathom is where world-curious travelers indulge their passion for travel — whether they’re getting on a plane tomorrow or staying at their laptop.

We created this site for those who tour the world spontaneously and deliberately. Who combine business with pleasure and familiarity with curiosity. Who love new discoveries as well as old classics.

We focus on places we like, writers we trust, and stories that move us. Our ruling astrological signs lead us to provide practical advice, timeless tips, and plenty of additional resources to help travelers hit the ground running. We’re committed to sharing this information the way we want all information: on the go, in the hand, and off the cuff.

Guides include:

  • lists of special and essential hotels, restaurants, shops, and sites the reflect the full spectrum of a destination, mixing old favorites with new finds at varying price points;
  • itineraries like It’s My First Time, Here on Business, Best Day Ever, With the Kids;
  • Cheat Sheets provide essential knowledge about money, transportation, tipping, holidays;
  • Local Color links to blogs, news sites, literary excerpts, books, and movies.
